title: 10 Times Bon Clay Proved He Was Luffy's Best Friend In One Piece
author: Rei Penber
description: An article detailing the ten most significant moments that demonstrated Bon Clay's unwavering friendship with Luffy, including their reunion in Impel Down and Bon Clay's heroic sacrifices throughout the arc.

title: Bon Clay is One Piece's Most Lovable Side Character, and Here's Why
author: Suzail Ahmad
description: Analysis of why Bon Clay became a fan-favorite character in One Piece, focusing on his personality, loyalty to Luffy, and unwavering ideals demonstrated throughout the series, especially during the Impel Down arc.

title: One Piece: How Bon Clay Became One of the Series' Best Characters
author: Suzail Ahmad
description: An in-depth look at Bon Clay's character development from antagonist to one of the series' most beloved characters, highlighting his amazing personality and loyalty shown during his reunion with Luffy in Impel Down.

title: One Piece: Why Do Fans Love Bon Clay So Much?
author: Suzail Ahmad
description: Article exploring the reasons behind Bon Clay's massive popularity among One Piece fans, covering his role in helping Luffy through the dangers of Impel Down and his selfless sacrifices.

title: One Piece Season 2 Can Introduce My Favorite Honorary Straw Hat and No, It's Not Vivi
author: Renaldo Matadeen
description: Opinion piece arguing that Bon Clay deserves recognition as an honorary Straw Hat member, describing how he carries a dying Luffy to Ivankov during the Impel Down arc and makes ultimate sacrifices for his friend.

title: One Piece: 5 Ways Ivankov Was The Hero Of Impel Down (& 5 It Was Bon Clay)
author: Rei Penber
description: Comparative analysis of the heroic contributions made by both Emporio Ivankov and Bon Clay during the Impel Down arc, examining their respective roles in helping Luffy and the mass prison break.

title: One Piece – Impel Down Arc (Episodes 422 – 456) Review
author: Hogan Reviews
description: Comprehensive review of the entire Impel Down arc covering episodes 422-456, analyzing the story, characters, and emotional beats including the reunion between Luffy and Bon Clay.

title: 432: The Unleashed Swan! A Reunion with Bon Clay!
author: Never Watched One Piece
description: Blog post reviewing Episode 432, praising the emotional reunion between Luffy and Bon Clay and noting how meaningful it is that Luffy remembers Bon Clay instantly despite meeting so many people in his journey.

title: The Unleashed Swan! A Reunion with Bon Clay! - Episode 432
author: AniDB
description: Episode database entry for Episode 432 with basic information, air date, and synopsis.

title: One Piece #432 - The Unleashed Swan! A Reunion with Bon Clay!
author: Comic Vine
description: Episode database entry with synopsis and user reviews for Episode 432.
